S04n420:1: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ śiśirakālavinirgate vaiśākhamāse viśākhānakṣatrānugate ṛtupravare vasantakālasamaye taruvarapatrākīrṇe varapravarapuṣpasaṃkusumite śītoṣṇatamorajovigate mṛduśādvale susaṃsthite tribhuvanajyeṣṭho lokamahito vyavalokya ṛtukālasamaye pañcadaśyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ poṣadhagṛhītāyā mātuḥ puṣyanakṣatrayogena bodhisattvastuṣitavarabhavanāccyutvā smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pāṇḍuro gajapoto bhūtvā ṣaḍdanta indragopakaśirāḥ suvarṇarājīdantaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgo'hīnendriyo jananyā dakṣiṇāyāṃ kukṣāvavakrāmat |
S04n420:8: na ca mama sukha jātu evarūpaṃ
S04n420:12: atha khalu māyādevī ābharaṇavigalitavasanā prahlāditakāyacittā prītiprāmodyaprasādapratilabdhā śayanavaratalādutthāya nārīgaṇaparivṛtā puraskṛtā prāsādavaraśikharādavatīrya yenāśokavanikā tenopajagāma |
S04n420:13: sā aśokavanikāyāṃ sukhopaviṣṭā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya dūtaṃ preṣayati sma-āgacchatu devo devī te draṣṭukāmeti ||
S04n420:14: atha sa rājā śuddhodanastadvacanaṃ śrutvā praharṣitamanā ākampitaśarīro bhadrāsanādutthāya amātyanaigamapārṣadyabandhujanaparivṛto yenāśokavanikā tenopasaṃkrāmat,
S04n420:15: upasaṃkrāntaśca na śaknoti sma aśokavanikāṃ praveṣṭum |
S04n420:17: aśokavanikādvāre sthito muhūrtaṃ saṃcintya tasyāṃ velāyāmimāṃ gāthāmabhāṣata—
S04n420:21: kimiha mama bhave'ṅgo kānva pṛccheya cāham ||3 || iti ||
S04n420:22: atha khalu śuddhāvāsakāyikā devaputrā gaganatalagatā ardhakāyamabhinirmāya rājānaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣanta—
S04n420:27: daśanakha tada kṛtvā svaṃ śiraṃ kampayanto
S04n420:30: vadahi kurumi kiṃ te kiṃ prayogo bhaṇāhi ||5 ||
S04n420:38: na ca mama khiladoṣo naiva roṣo na moho
S04n420:42: supinu mama hi yemaṃ vyākarī tattvayuktaṃ
S04n420:43: kimida mama bhaveyā śreyu pāpaṃ kulasya ||8 ||
S04n420:47: supina mayi ha dṛṣṭastasya hetuṃ śṛṇotha ||9 ||
S04n420:48: brāhmaṇā āhuḥ-brūhi devi tvayā kīdṛśaṃ svapnaṃ dṛṣṭam |
S04n420:56: prīti vipula cintyā nāsti pāpaṃ kulasya |
S04n420:59: sa ca pura vijahitvā kāmarājyaṃ ca gehaṃ
S04n420:65: iti hi bhikṣavo rājā śuddhodano brāhmaṇebhyo lakṣaṇanaimittikavaipañcakebhyaḥ svapnādhyāyīpāṭhakebhyaḥ pratiśrutya hṛṣṭastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastān brāhmaṇān prabhūtena khādanīyabhojanīyāsvādanīyena saṃtarpya saṃpravāryācchādanāni ca datvā visarjayati sma |
S04n420:66: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ kapilavastuni mahānagare caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu sarvanagaracatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu ca dānaṃ dāpayati sma annamannārthikebhyaḥ,
S04n420:70: evaṃ gandhamālyavilepanaśayyopāśrayaṃ prājīvikaṃ prājīvikārthibhyo yāvadeva bodhisattvasya pūjākarmaṇe ||
S04n420:71: atha khalu bhikṣavo rājñaḥ śuddhodanasyaitadabhavat- katamasmin gṛhe māyādevī sukhamanupakliṣṭā viharediti |
S04n420:72: atha tatkṣaṇameva catvāro mahārājāno rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ—
S04n420:73: alpotsuko deva bhava sukhaṃ tiṣṭha upekṣako |
S04n420:74: vayaṃ hi bodhisattvasya veśma vai māpayāmahe ||14 ||
S04n420:75: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha—
S04n420:78: atha khalu suyāmo devaputro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamusaṃkramyaivamāha—
S04n420:81: atha khalu saṃtuṣito devaputro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha—
S04n420:84: atha khalu sunirmito devaputro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha—
S04n420:87: atha khalu paranirmitavaśavartī devaputro rājānaṃ śuddhodanamupasaṃkramyaivamāha—
S04n420:94: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ sarvaiḥ kāmāvacarraidaiveśvarairbodhisattvasya pūjārthaṃ kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi māpitānyabhūvan |
S04n420:95: rājñā capi śuddhodanena manuṣyātikrāntaṃ divyāsaṃprāptaṃ gṛhataraṃ pratisaṃskāritamabhūt |
S04n420:96: tatra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāvyūhasya samādheranubhāvena sarveṣu teṣu gṛheṣu māyādevīmupadarśayati sma |
S04n420:97: abhyantaragataśca bodhisattvo māyādevyāḥ kukṣau dakṣiṇe pārśve paryaṅkamābhujya niṣaṇṇo'bhūt |
S04n420:98: sarve ca te deveśvarā ekaikamevaṃ saṃjānīte sma-mamaiva gṛhe bodhisattvamātā prativasati nānyatreti ||
S04n420:104: atha khalu tasyāṃ devaparṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhavat-ye'pi tāvaccāturmahārājakāyikā devāste'pi tāvanmanuṣyāśrayagatatvena nirvidyāpakramanti |
S04n420:105: kaḥ punarvādo ye tadanye udāratamā devāḥ trāyatriṃśā vā yāmā vā tuṣitā vā |
S04n420:106: tatkathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bodhisattvaḥ śucirnirāmagandhaḥ sattvaratnaḥ saṃtuṣitāddevanikāyāccyutvā durgandhe manuṣyāśraye daśamāsān mātuḥ kukṣau sthita iti ||
S04n420:107: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando buddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat-āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvajjugupsanīyaśca mātṛgrāmastathāgatenokto yāvadrāgacaritaśca |
S04n420:109: kathaṃ hi nāma sarvalokābhyudgato bhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva tuṣitāddevanikāyāccyavitvā manuṣyāśraye (durgandhe)
S04n420:112: nāhaṃ bhagavan idamutsahe evaṃ vaktaṃ yathaiva pūrve bhagavatā vyākṛtamiti |
S04n420:113: bhagavānāha-icchasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭuṃ yo mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya paribhogo'bhūt |
S04n420:116: yattathāgatastaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamupadarśayed yaṃ dṛṣṭvā prītiṃ vetsyāmaḥ ||
S04n420:118: yad brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhamaṣṭaṣaṣṭibrahmaśatasahasrairbrahmaloke'ntarhito bhagavataḥ purataḥ pratyasthāt |
S04n420:119: sa bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ tripradakṣiṇīkṛtyaikānte'sthāt prāñjalībhūto bhagavantaṃ namasyan |
S04n420:120: tatra khalu bhagavān jānanneva brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāmantrayate sma-gṛhītastvayā brahman sa bodhisattvaparibhogo daśamāsiko yo mama pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūtasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyābhūt |
S04n420:126: bhagavānāha-tena hi tvaṃ brahman upadarśaya taṃ daśamāsikaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogam,
S04n420:128: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatistān brāhmaṇānetadavocat-tiṣṭhatu tāvadbhavanto yāvadvayaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogamānayiṣyāmaḥ ||
S04n420:129: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatirbhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivanditvā bhagavataḥ purato'ntarhitastatkṣaṇameva brahmaloke pratyasthāt ||
S04n420:130: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ subrahmāṇaṃ devaputrametadavocat-gaccha tvaṃ mārṣā ito brahmalokamupādāya yāvattrāyatriṃśadbhavanam-śabdamudīraya,
S04n420:134: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiścaturaśītyā devakoṭyā nayutaśatasahasraḥ sārdhaṃ taṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ parigṛhya mahati brāhme vimāne triyojanaśatike pratiṣṭhāpyānekairdaivakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraiḥ samantato'nuparivārya jambūdvīpamavatārayati sma ||
S04n420:135: tena khalu punaḥ samayena kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ mahāsaṃnipāto'bhūt bhagavatsakāśe gantum |
S04n420:136: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo divyairvastrairdivyairmālyairdivyairgandhairdivyaiḥ puṣpairdivyairvādyairdivyaiśca paribhaugairabhisaṃskṛto'bhūt |
S04n420:137: tāvanmaheśākhyaiśca devaiḥ parivṛto'bhūd yacchakro devānāmindraḥ sumerau(samudre)
S04n420:138: sthitvā dūrata eva mukhe tālacchatrakaṃ dattvā śīrṣavyavalokanenānuvilokayati sma unmeṣadhyāyikayā vā |
S04n420:144: atha khalu bhagavāṃstaṃ divyaṃ vādyanirghoṣamantardhāpayati sma |
S04n420:145: tatkasmāt? yatsahaśravaṇādeva jāmbudvīpakā manuṣyā unmādamāpatsyanta iti ||
S04n420:146: atha khalu catvāro mahārājānaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramupasaṃkramyaivamāhuḥ-kathaṃ devānāmindra kariṣyāmo na labhāmahe ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ draṣṭum |
S04n420:149: api tu khalu punarmārṣā bhagavatsamīpamupanītaṃ drakṣyāmaḥ |
S04n420:150: te tadā āhuḥ-tena hi devānāmindra tathā kuru yathāsya kṣipraṃ darśanaṃ bhavet |
S04n420:151: śakra āha-āgamayata mārṣā muhūrtaṃ yāvadatikrāntātikrāntatamā devaputrā bhagavantaṃ pratisaṃmodayante sma |
S04n420:153: atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ taiścaturaśītyā devakoṭīnayutaśatasahasraistaṃ ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmayati sma |
S04n420:154: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaścaturasraścatuṣṭhūṇaḥ |
S04n420:156: evaṃpramāṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ṣaṇmāsajāto dāraka uccaistvena |
S04n420:157: tasya khalu punaḥ kūtāgārasya madhye paryaṅkaḥ prajñaptaḥ tadyathāpi nāma ṣaṇmāsajātasya dārakasya bhittīphalakaḥ |
S04n420:158: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhoga evaṃ varṇasaṃsthāno yasya na kaścit sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sadṛśo'sti ākṛtyā vā varṇena vā |
S04n420:159: devāḥ khalvapi taṃ dṛṣṭvā āścaryaprāptā abhuvan |
S04n420:161: sa ca tathāgatasyāntika upanīto'tīva bhāsate tapati virocate sma |
S04n420:162: tadyathāpi nāma dvinirdhāntaṃ suvarṇaṃ kuśalena karmakāreṇa supariniṣṭhitamapagatakācadoṣam,
S04n420:165: tasmin khalu punarbodhisattvaparibhoge paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto yasya sadevake loke nāsti kaścit sadṛśo varṇena vā saṃsthānena vā anyatra kambugrīvāyā bodhisattvasya |
S04n420:167: tattasya bodhisattvaparyaṅkasyāgrato na bhāsate sma tadyathāpi nāma vātavṛṣṭyābhihataḥ kṛṣṇakambalaḥ |
S04n420:168: sa khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāra uragasāracandanamayo yasyaikasuvarṇadharaṇī sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ mūlyaṃ kṣamate,
S04n420:170: tādṛśa eva dvitīyaḥ kūṭāgāraḥ kṛto yastasmin prathame kūṭāgāre'bhyantarataḥ asakto'baddhasthitaḥ |
S04n420:171: tādṛśa eva tṛtīyo'pi kūṭāgāro yastasmin dvitīye kūṭāgāre'bhyantare'sakto'baddhasthitaḥ |
S04n420:172: sa ca paryaṅkastasmin gandhamaye tṛtīye kūṭāgāre vyavasthitaḥ saṃpraticchannaḥ |
S04n420:173: tasya khalu punaruragasāracandanasyaivaṃrūpo varṇaḥ tadyathāpi nāma abhijātasya nīlaivaḍūryasya |
S04n420:174: tasya khalu punargandhakūṭāgārasyopari samantādyāvanti kāniciddivyātikrāntāni puṣpāṇi santi,
S04n420:175: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin kūṭāgāre bodhisattvasya pūrvakuśalamūlavipākenānuprāptānyeva jāyante sma |
S04n420:176: sa khalu puna ratnavyūho bodhisattvaparibhogo dṛḍhasāro'bhedyo vajropamaḥ sparśena ca kācilindikasukhasaṃsparśaḥ |
S04n420:177: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge ye kecit kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devānāṃ bhavanavyūhāste sarve tasmin saṃdṛśyante sma ||
S04n420:178: yāmeva ca rātriṃ bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣimavakrāntastāmeva rātrimadha āpaskandhamupādāya aṣṭaṣaṣṭiyojanaśatasahasrāṇi mahāpṛthivīṃ bhittvā yāvad brahmalokaṃ padmabhyudgatamabhūt |
S04n420:179: na ca kaścittaṃ padmaṃ paśyati sma anyatra sārathinarottamāddaśaśatasāhasrikācca mahābrahmaṇaḥ |
S04n420:180: yacceha trisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātāvojo vā maṇḍo va raso vā,
S04n420:181: tatsarvaṃ tasmin mahāpadme madhubinduḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma ||
S04n420:182: tamenaṃ mahābrahmā śubhe vaiḍūryabhājane prakṣipya bodhisattvasyopanāmayati sma |
S04n420:183: taṃ bodhisattvaḥ parigṛhya bhuṅkte sma mahābrahmaṇo'nukampāmupādāya |
S04n420:184: nāsti sa kaścit sattvaḥ sattvanikāye yasya sa ojobinduḥ paribhuktaḥ samyak sukhena pariṇāmedanyatra caramabhavikādbodhisattvāt sarvabodhisattvabhūmiparipūrṇāt |
S04n420:185: kasya ca karmaṇo vipākena sa ojobindurbodhisattvasyopatiṣṭhate sma?
S04n420:186: dīrgharātraṃ khalvapi bodhisattvena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo bhaiṣajyaṃ dattamāśatparāṇāṃ sattvānāmāśāḥ paripūritāḥ,
S04n420:188: nityaṃ cāgrapuṣpamagraphalamagrarasaṃ tathāgatebhyastathāgatacaityebhyastathāgataśrāvakasaṃghebhyo mātāpitṛbhyaśca dattvā paścādātmanā paribhuktam |
S04n420:189: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mahābrahmā bodhisattvasya taṃ madhubindumupanāmayati sma ||
S04n420:190: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre yāni kānicit santyatikrāntātikrāntāni māyāguṇaratikrīḍāsamavasṛtasthānāni,
S04n420:191: tāni sarvāṇi tasmin prādurbhāvāni saṃdṛśyante sma bodhisattvasya pūrvakarmavipākena ||
S04n420:192: tasmin khalu puna ratnavyūhe bodhisattvaparibhoge śatasahasravyūhaṃ nāma vāsoyugaṃ prādurbhūtam |
S04n420:193: na sa kaścitsattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate yasya tatprādurbhavedanyatra caramabhavikād bodhisattvāt |
S04n420:194: na ca te kecana udārodārā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā ye tasmin kūṭāgāre na saṃdṛśyante sma |
S04n420:195: sacetkūṭāgāraparibhoga evaṃ suparibhoga evaṃ supariniṣpannaḥ sāntarabahirevaṃ supariniṣṭhita evaṃ mṛdukaśca |
S04n420:198: dharmatā khalveṣā bodhisattvasya pūrvakeṇa ca praṇidhānena iyaṃ cetanā ṛddhāvavaśyaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manuṣyaloka upapattavyamabhiniṣkramya cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmacakraṃ pravartayitavyam |
S04n420:202: na hi caramabhavikasya bodhisattvasya kalalārbudaghanapeśībhāvaṃ kāyaḥ saṃtiṣṭhate sma |
S04n420:203: atha tarhi sarvāṅgapratyaṅgalakṣaṇasaṃpannaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇa eva prādurbhavati |
S04n420:204: svapnāntaragatā ca bodhisattvamātā māyādevī mahānāgakuñjaramavakrāntaṃ saṃjānīte sma ||
S04n420:205: tasya khalu punastathā niṣaṇṇasya śakro devānāmindraścatvāraśca mahārājāno'ṣṭāviṃśatiśca mahāyakṣasenāpatayo guhyakādhipatiśca nāma yakṣakulaṃ yato vajrapāṇerutpattiste bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitamanubaddhā bhavanti sma |
S04n420:206: santi khalu punaścatasro bodhisattvaparicārakā devatāḥ-utkhalī ca nāma samutkhalī ca nāma dhvajavatī ca nāma prabhāvatī ca nāma |
S04n420:207: tā api bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ viditvā satataṃ samitaṃ rakṣanti sma |
S04n420:208: śakro'pi devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrairdevaputraśatairbodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jñātvā satataṃ samitamanubadhnāti sma ||
S04n420:210: tadyathāpi nāma parvatamūrdhani rātrāvandhakāratamisrāyāṃ mahānagniskandho yojanādapi dṛśyate sma,
S04n420:212: evameva bodhisattvasya mātuḥ kukṣigatasyātmabhāvo'bhinirvṛtto'bhūt prabhāsvaro'bhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ |
S04n420:213: sa tasmin kūṭāgāre paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇo'tīva śobhate sma |
S04n420:215: bodhisattvasya mātā ca nidhyāya sthitā paśyati sma kukṣigataṃ bodhisattvam |
S04n420:216: tadyathāpi nāma mahato'bhrakūṭādvidyuto niḥsṛtya mahāntamavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayanti,
S04n420:217: evameva bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena ca taṃ prathamaṃ ratnakūṭāgāramavabhāsayati sma |
S04n420:221: tamavabhāsya yatra cāsane niṣaṇṇo bhavati sma tadavabhāsayati sma |
S04n420:223: sarvaṃ gṛhamavabhāsya gṛhasyopariṣṭānniḥsṛtya pūrvāṃ diśamavabhāsayati sma |
S04n420:224: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāṃ uttarāmadha ūrdhvaṃ samantāddaśadiśaḥ krośamātramekaikasyāṃ diśi mātuḥ kukṣigato bodhisattvaḥ śriyā tejasā varṇena cāvabhāsayati sma ||
S04n420:225: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaścatvāro mahārājāno'ṣṭāviṃśacca mahāyakṣasenāpatayaḥ sārdhaṃ pañcamātrayakṣaśataiḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca |
S04n420:226: tadā bodhisattvastānāgatān viditvā dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimabhyutkṣipya ekāṅgulikayā āsanānyupadarśayati sma |
S04n420:228: paśyanti sma bodhisattvaṃ mātuḥ kukṣigataṃ jātarūpamiva vigrahaṃ hastaṃ cālayantaṃ vicālayantam utkṣipantaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayantam |
S04n420:230: niṣaṇṇāṃśca tān viditvā bodhisattvo dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma |
S04n420:231: yadā ca prakramitukāmā bhavanti tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva vicintitaṃ vijñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma |
S04n420:234: tadā teṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mahārājānāmevaṃ bhavati sma-visarjitāḥ sma vayaṃ bodhisattveneti |
S04n420:235: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma |
S04n420:236: ayaṃ heturayaṃ pratyayo yadbodhisattvo rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ saṃcārya vicārayati sma |
S04n420:237: vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānaṃstaṃ pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma |
S04n420:238: punaraparaṃ yadā bodhisattvasya keciddarśanāyāgacchanti sma striyo vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā,
S04n420:241: iti hi bhikṣavo bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigataḥ san sattvān pratisaṃmodanakuśalo bhavati smeti |
S04n420:242: na ca kaściddevo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā yaḥ śaknoti sma bodhisattvaṃ pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmoditum |
S04n420:243: atha tarhi bodhisattva eva tāvat pūrvataraṃ pratisaṃmodate sma,
S04n420:245: nirgate khalu punaḥ pūrvāhṇakālasamaye madhyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu śakro devānāmindro niṣkrāntaḥ |
S04n420:246: abhiniṣkrāntāśca trāyatriṃśaddevaputrā bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya |
S04n420:248: tāṃśca bodhisattvo dūrata evāgacchato dṛṣṭvā dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhuṃ prasārya śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ devāṃśca trāyatriṃśān pratisaṃmodate sma |
S04n420:250: na ca śaknoti sma bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindro bodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum |
S04n420:251: niṣīdati sma śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu |
S04n420:252: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma |
S04n420:253: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
S04n420:255: tatasteṣāmevaṃ bhavati sma-asmābhiḥ sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃmodate sma |
S04n420:256: ekaikaścaivaṃ saṃjānīte sma-mayaiva sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04n420:258: tasmin khalu punaḥ kūṭāgāre śakrasya devānāmindrasya trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāṃ ca pratibhāsaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma |
S04n420:259: na khalu punaranyatraivaṃ pariśuddho bodhisattvaparibhogo bhavati yathā mātuḥ kukṣigatasya bodhisattvasya |
S04n420:260: yadā ca bhikṣavaḥ śakro devānāmindrastadanye ca devaputrāḥ prakramitukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04n420:261: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇimutkṣipya saṃcārayanti sma |
S04n420:262: saṃcārya vicārya punarapi smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pratiṣṭhāpayati sma |
S04n420:264: tadā śakrasya devānāmindrasyānyeṣāṃ ca trāyatriṃśānāṃ devānāmevaṃ bhavati sma-visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti |
S04n420:265: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya prakrāmanti sma ||
S04n420:266: nirgate ca khalu punarbhikṣavo madhyāhnakālasamaye sāyāhnakālasamaye pratyupasthite atha khalu brahmā sahāpatiranekairbrahmakāyikairdevaputraśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtastaṃ divyamojobindumādāya yena bodhisattvastenopasaṃkrāmati sma bodhisattvaṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ dharmaṃ ca śrotum |
S04n420:267: samanvāharati sma bhikṣavaḥ bodhisattvo brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatimāgacchantaṃ saparivāram |
S04n420:268: punareva ca bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇapāṇimutkṣipya brahmāṇaṃ sahāpatiṃ brahmakāyikāṃśca devaputrān pratisaṃmodate sma |
S04n420:270: na ca śaktirasti bhikṣavo brahmaṇaḥ sahāpaterbodhisattvasyājñāṃ pratiroddhum |
S04n420:271: niṣīdati sma bhikṣavo brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā yathāprajñapteṣvāsaneṣu |
S04n420:272: tān bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇān viditvā dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati sma samādāpayati sma samuttejayati sma saṃpraharṣayati sma |
S04n420:273: yena ca bodhisattvaḥ pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma,
S04n420:275: tatasteṣāmekaikasyaivaṃ bhavati sma-mayā sārdhaṃ bodhisattvaḥ saṃlapati,
S04n420:277: yadā ca brahmā sahāpatistadanye ca brahmakāyikā devaputrā gantukāmā bhavanti sma,
S04n420:278: tadā bodhisattvasteṣāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya dakṣiṇaṃ suvarṇavarṇaṃ bāhumutkṣipya saṃcārayati sma |
S04n420:280: saṃcārya vicārya avasādatākāreṇa pāṇiṃ saṃcārayati sma |
S04n420:282: tato brahmaṇaḥ sahāpatestadanyeṣāṃ ca brahmakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāmevaṃ bhavati sma-visarjitā vayaṃ bodhisattveneti |
S04n420:283: te bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvamātaraṃ ca tripradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti sma |
S04n420:284: bodhisattvaśca smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan pāṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati sma ||
S04n420:285: āgacchanti sma khalu punarbhikṣavaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇapaścimottarābhyo digbhyo'dhastādupariṣṭāt santāddaśabhyo digbhyo bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvasya darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya ca dharmasaṃgītisaṃgāyanāya ca |
S04n420:286: teṣāmāgatāgatānāṃ bodhisattvaḥ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjya prabhāvyūhāni siṃhāsanānyabhinirmimīte sma |
S04n420:288: niṣaṇṇāṃścainān viditvā paripṛcchati sma paripraśnayati sma yadutāsyaiva bodhisattvasya mahāyānasya vistaravibhāgatāmupādāya |
S04n420:289: na ca tān kaścidanyaḥ paśyati sma anyatra sabhāgebhyo devaputrebhyaḥ |
S04n420:290: ayaṃ bhikṣavo heturayaṃ pratyayo yena bodhisattvaḥ praśāntāyāṃ rātryāṃ kāyāt prabhāmutsṛjati sma ||
S04n420:291: na khalu punarbhikṣavo māyādevī bodhisattvakukṣigate gurukāyatāṃ saṃjānīte sma anyatra laghutāmeva mṛdutāmeva saukhyatāmeva |
S04n420:293: na ca rāgaparidāhena vā dveṣaparidāhena vā mohaparidāhena vā paridahyate sma |
S04n420:294: na ca kāmavitarkaṃ vā vyāpādavitarkaṃ vā vihiṃsāvitarkaṃ vā vitarkayati sma |
S04n420:295: na ca śītaṃ na coṣṇaṃ vā jighatsāṃ vā pipāsāṃ vā tamo vā rajo vā kleśaṃ vā saṃjānīte sma paśyati vā |
S04n420:296: na cāsyā amanāpā rūpaśabdagandharasasparśā vā ābhāsamāgacchanti sma |
S04n420:297: na ca pāpakān svapnān paśyati sma |
S04n420:298: na cāsyāḥ strīmāyā na śāṭhyaṃ nerṣyā na strīkleśā bādhante sma |
S04n420:299: pañcaśikṣāpadasamādattā khalu punaḥ śīlavatī daśakuśalakarmapathe pratiṣṭhitā tasmin samaye bodhisattvamātā bhavati sma |
S04n420:300: na ca bodhisattvamātuḥ kvacit puruṣe rāgacittamutpadyate sma,
S04n420:302: ye ca kecitkapilāhvaye mahāpuravare anyeṣu vā janapadeṣu devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍabhūtāviṣṭāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikā vā,
S04n420:303: te sarve bodhisattvamātuḥ sahadarśanādeva svasthāḥ smṛtipratilabdhā bhavanti sma |
S04n420:305: ye ca kecinnānārogaspṛṣṭāḥ sattvā bhavanti sma,
S04n420:307: cakṣurogeṇa vā śrotrarogeṇa vā ghrāṇarogeṇa vā jihvārogeṇa vā oṣṭharogeṇa vā dantarogeṇa kaṇṭharogeṇa vā galagaṇḍarogeṇa vā uragaṇḍakuṣṭhakilāsaśoṣonmādāpasmārajvaragalagaṇḍapiṭakavisarpavicarcikādyai rogaiḥ saṃpīḍyante sma,
S04n420:308: teṣāṃ bodhisattvamātā dakṣiṇapāṇiṃ mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayati sma |
S04n420:309: te sahapratiṣṭhāpite pāṇau vigatavyādhayo bhūtvā svakasvakāni gṛhāṇi gacchanti sma |
S04n420:310: antato māyādevī tṛṇagulmakamapi dharaṇitalādabhyutkṣipya glānebhyaḥ sattvebhyo'nuprayacchati sma |
S04n420:312: yadā ca māyādevī svaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ pratyavekṣate sma,
S04n420:314: tadyathāpi nāma supariśuddha ādarśamaṇḍale mukhamaṇḍalaṃ dṛśyate |
S04n420:315: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭā udagrā āttamanā pramuditā prītisaumanasyajātā bhavati sma ||
S04n420:316: bodhisattvasya khalu punarbhikṣavo mātuḥ kukṣigatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ satataṃ samitaṃ rātriṃdivaṃ divyāni tūryāṇi abhi(nirmāya)
S04n420:321: kālena ṛtavo nakṣatrāṇi ca parivartante sma |
S04n420:322: kṣemaṃ ca rājyaṃ subhikṣaṃ ca sumanākulamanubhavati sma |
S04n420:323: sarve ca kapilāhvaye mahāpuravare śākyā anye ca sattvāḥ khādanti sma,
S04n420:331: rājāpi śuddhodanaḥ saṃprāptabrahmacaryoparatarāṣṭrakāryo'pi supariśuddhastapovanagata iva dharmamevānuvartate sma ||
S04n420:332: evaṃrūpeṇa bhikṣava ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa samanvāgato bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato'sthāt |
S04n420:333: tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma-drakṣyasi tvamānanda ratnavyūhaṃ bodhisattvaparibhogaṃ yatra bodhisattvo mātuḥ kukṣigato vyāhārṣīt |
S04n420:335: darśayati sma tathāgata āyuṣmata ānandasya śakrasya devānāmindrasya caturṇāṃ ca lokapālānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ ca devamanuṣyāṇām |
S04n420:336: dṛṣṭvā ca te tuṣṭā abhūvan udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātāḥ |
S04n420:337: sa ca brahmā sahāpatiḥ punareva brahmaloke samāropya pratiṣṭhāpayati sma caityārtham ||
S04n420:338: tatra khalu bhagavān punarapi bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma-iti hi bhikṣavo daśamāsakukṣigatena bodhisattvena ṣaṭtriṃśannayutāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ triṣu yāneṣu paripācitānyabhūvan |
S04n420:352: na asti sarvasattvakāyi bhuktu yo jareya taṃ
S04n420:364: ye ca iṣṭidārakāsu duḥkhitā tadā abhūt
S04n420:366: te ca sarva dṛṣṭva māya bhonti labdhacetanā
S04n420:371: sthāpite sma māya mūrdhni pāṇi bhonti nirjarā ||30 ||
S04n420:372: athāpi vā tṛṇasya tūli bhūmito gṛhītvanā
S04n420:373: dadāti māya āturāṇa sarvi bhonti nirjarā |
S04n420:380: no ca tasya rāga doṣa naiva moha bādhate
S04n420:381: kāmachandu naiva tasya īrṣi naiva hiṃsitā |
S04n420:383: kṣudhāpipāsa śīta uṣṇa naiva tasya bādhate ||33 ||
S04n420:387: no viheṭhi no vihiṃsi tatra te parasyaram ||34 ||
S04n420:390: kṣamā rajoanākulā ca kāli deva varṣate
S04n420:391: tṛṇāśca puṣpa oṣadhīya tasmi kāli rohiṣu ||35 ||
S04n420:393: yato daridrasattva gṛhya dāna denti bhuñjate |
S04n420:394: nāsti sattva yo daridra yo ca āsi duḥkhito
S04n420:396: so ca rāju śākiyāna poṣadhī upoṣito
S04n420:398: tapovanaṃ ca so praviṣṭa māyādevī pṛcchate
